content.rendered:
Experience our

Party and Marriage Hall

Introduction of Outdoor Banquet hall

Kings Club Outdoor Banquet hall is one of the most gorgeous venues in Bangalore for hosting any occasion with exceptional decor and stunning infrastructure. It is surrounded by lots of green spaces with natural lighting that makes it a perfect destination in Bangalore. You will have the perfect venues to host meetings, seminars, exhibitions, weddings and receptions.
Our stylish & high-class Outdoor Banquet hall possesses comfortable & versatile event spaces for organizing a variety of functions and parties. We are well-known for our dedicated services, great support staff and an exclusive ambiance where you can enjoy your events to the fullest without any worry.

Features, Amenities & Benefits

Kings Club Outdoor Banquet hall is well-known to host any functions in a grand way and impress your guests with our hospitality and state-of-the-art facilities. Your guests will be impressed by the innovative & gorgeous decoration combined with the excellent hospitality by our experienced team.
We possess a great service staff to create a welcoming ambiance. You will have all facilities at Kings Club Outdoor Banquet hall such as basic power, electricity, and backup, valet parking, furniture, to ensure that all your celebration events proceed without any hassle.
A dance workout is fun & also provides several health benefits. Here is a list of health benefits of joining a fitness dance class:
  • It improves your muscle tone and strength.
  • It improves your reflexes & makes your body agile
  • Cardio dance workout improves your aerobic metabolism.
  • It assists in improving your spatial awareness and body balance.
  • Dance strengthens muscles and improves motor fitness.
  • Performing cardio dance on a daily basis can assist you in maintaining your blood pressure.

Overview A/c Party Hall

Centrally Air Conditioned

Outdoor Non A/c Sq.ft 8000
Indoor A/c Sq.ft 2000

Capacity

Theatre Style 600
Banquet Style 400

Dining Hall Capacity

Banquet Style 400

Car Parking Lot

200

Ac Room Count

14

Two Wheeler Parking

200

Seating Arrangements

  • Theater Style
  • U Shape
  • Cluster Seating
  • Classroom
  • Hollow Square
  • Board room

Social Events

You can perform several types of dance workouts to become a dance fit. Here is a list of the type of fitness dance classes:

Wedding

Engagement

Birthdays

Corporate Events

Additional Services

Amenities

  • Air Conditioned
  • Power Backup
  • Kitchen
  • Restroom
  • Sound System
  • Mike

Services

  • Purohit
  • Photographer
  • Videographer
  • Florist
  • Choreographer
  • Astrologer
  • Lighting
  • Orchestra
  • Security Guard
  • Has Own Decorator
  • Hawan Allowed
  • Baraat Allowed
  • Firecrackers Allowed
  • Service Hours till 12:00 pm

No Restrictions on

  • Smoking
  • Alcohol
  • Firecrackers Allowed
  • Hawan Allowed
  • Baraat Allowed
  • Service Hours till 12:00 Midnight

About Certified Fitness Dance Trainer

Our Trainer has 10 years of experience in the field of Dancing, Choreography, and Dance fitness. Kings Club fitness dance class boasts of a team of professional trainers who can pay individual attention and make you able to perform tough moves easily. Apart from salsa, freestyle, hip-hop, he/she also teaches the ever popular Bollywood style of dancing.

With Kings Club fitness dance class, fitness just gets easier and more fun. He/she nurtures young talents to polish and perfect their dancing skills to a professional level. He/she creates an opportunity for students to showcase their talents on stage each year. He/she teaches several dance classes ranging from Indian classical to western & contemporary.
About Us

Gallery

What Customers Are Saying About Us
We pride ourselves on what
our happy clients say.

I have celebrated my birthday at the Kings Club Banquet Hall, Indoor A/c Banquet for the this year! I have celebrated other family and friend functions at this location and my family only plans their events at Kings Club! Thank you for making our events so special. You food is great, your service is the best and your hall is beautiful!

Krishna Prasad

I had my engagement party at Kings Club and let me tell you everybody fell in love with the hall. The food was delicious, the service was outstanding, and the decor was so lush and elegant. People will not stop telling me how gorgeous everything was. Thank you Kings Club team for making my occasion so beautiful and fun!!!! I will definitely be having more parties here to come!!!

Mandeep & Vinutha

Being one of the first receptions in a brand new banquet hall, I had my reservations. Will it be ready in time, how will it look like, what would the food taste like. Needless to say that the night was perfect, the hall looks elegant and spectacular. The service was great and the food was awesome. Thanks for contributing to a very memorable night.

Shloka & Karan

Our Partners

Kings Club fitness dance class is approved by Government, some specific sports council, & sports associations.

FAQ

1. Do Banquet Hall prices include decoration cost?
Yes
2. What is the starting menu price/plate/buffet at Kings Club Banquet?
For more details call or Manager for best deals
3. How soon should we book Banquet halls at Kings Club?
Whenever you wish to conduct any event or occasion
4. What are the facilities available in Kings Club Banquet Hall?
Lot of facilities for Members and Non-Members
